diagram:
@startuml
actor Customer as "Customer"
boundary Website as "E Commerce Website"
control OrderService as "Order Service"
control PaymentGateway as "Payment Gateway"
control InventoryService as "Inventory Service"
database OrderDatabase as "Order Database"
database PaymentDatabase as "Payment Database"
Customer ->> Website: Browses products and adds to cart
Website ->> OrderService: Creates order
OrderService ->> InventoryService: Checks product availability
InventoryService ->> OrderService: Returns availability
OrderService ->> OrderDatabase: Saves order
OrderService <<-- OrderDatabase: Order saved
OrderService ->> PaymentGateway: Processes payment
PaymentGateway ->> PaymentDatabase: Saves payment
PaymentGateway <<-- PaymentDatabase: Payment saved
PaymentGateway ->> OrderService: Payment result
note over OrderService, PaymentGateway: Payment processing may involve multiple steps and external services
alt Payment Successful
  OrderService ->> OrderDatabase: Updates order status
  OrderService <<-- OrderDatabase: Order status updated
  Website ->> Customer: Displays order confirmation
else Payment Failed
  OrderService ->> OrderDatabase: Cancels order
  OrderService <<-- OrderDatabase: Order cancelled
  Website ->> Customer: Displays payment failure message
end
note over Customer, Website: Customer may receive email notifications for order updates
@enduml
raw_diagram:
@startuml
actor Customer as "Customer"
boundary Website as "E Commerce Website"
control OrderService as "Order Service"
control PaymentGateway as "Payment Gateway"
control InventoryService as "Inventory Service"
database OrderDatabase as "Order Database"
database PaymentDatabase as "Payment Database"

Customer ->> Website: Browses products and adds to cart
Website ->> OrderService: Creates order
OrderService ->> InventoryService: Checks product availability
InventoryService ->> OrderService: Returns availability
OrderService ->> OrderDatabase: Saves order
OrderService <<-- OrderDatabase: Order saved

OrderService ->> PaymentGateway: Processes payment
PaymentGateway ->> PaymentDatabase: Saves payment
PaymentGateway <<-- PaymentDatabase: Payment saved
PaymentGateway ->> OrderService: Payment result
note over OrderService, PaymentGateway: Payment processing may involve multiple steps and external services

alt Payment Successful
  OrderService ->> OrderDatabase: Updates order status
  OrderService <<-- OrderDatabase: Order status updated
  Website ->> Customer: Displays order confirmation
else Payment Failed
  OrderService ->> OrderDatabase: Cancels order
  OrderService <<-- OrderDatabase: Order cancelled
  Website ->> Customer: Displays payment failure message
end

note over Customer, Website: Customer may receive email notifications for order updates
@enduml
